UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: CCL28 has dual roles in mucosal immunity as a chemokine with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Hieshima K, Ohtani H, Shibano M, Izawa D, Nakayama T, Kawasaki Y, Shiba F, Shiota M, Katou F, Saito T, Yoshie O

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(IC50=1.7±0.1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 9632(IC50=1.6±0.1µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(IC50=1.5±0.3µM),Streptococcus pyogenes(IC50=4.5±0.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(IC50=0.9±0.1µM),Candida albicans(IC50=1.3±1.0µM)
